price: 34. Ma sinna samaanta iyo xumaantu, ku qaabil (xumaha) waxa wax u wanaagsan (cafis iyo masaamax iyo asxaan fal), markaas eeg! Kii ay idiin dhexeysay isaga iyo adiga cadaawadi (wuxuu noqonayaa) sidii saaxiib aad isku weyn tihiin.
arabic: وَلَا تَسۡتَوِي ٱلۡحَسَنَةُ وَلَا ٱلسَّيِّئَةُۚ ٱدۡفَعۡ بِٱلَّتِي هِيَ أَحۡسَنُ فَإِذَا ٱلَّذِي بَيۡنَكَ وَبَيۡنَهُۥ عَدَٰوَةٞ كَأَنَّهُۥ وَلِيٌّ حَمِيمٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walā tastawī al-ḥasanatu walā al-sayi-atu id'faʿ bi-allatī hiya aḥsanu fa-idhā alladhī baynaka wabaynahu ʿadāwatun ka-annahu waliyyun ḥamīmun
